content:
I think I'll start by listing the laptops as a bundle and seeing how that goes. If I don't get any interest, I can always break them down and sell them individually. For the furniture, I'll list each piece separately to see how that goes. I like the idea of offering a "bundle and save" option, so I'll make sure to mention that in my listings.

Also, I was thinking about my financial goals and how selling these items can help me achieve them. Since I'm trying to pay off my credit card debt and build an emergency fund, I think I'll allocate the money from these sales towards those goals. Do you think that's a good idea?
